summary: The module processes simulation results from multiple treatment policy scenarios, computes comparative metrics such as appointment counts, health system interactions, DALYs, and mortality across demographic and cause dimensions, and generates a suite of visualizations (bar charts, horizontal bar charts, organ charts) to illustrate the relative impact of each treatment set versus a baseline.
business_intent: To support health policy evaluation by quantifying and visualizing how different treatment configurations affect health system utilization and health outcomes across diverse population groups, enabling evidenceâ€‘based decision making.
